seo.title: Lovart: AI Design Platform for Creative Professionals
seo.description: Unlock your creative potential with Lovart, the AI-powered design platform. Create stunning visuals, collaborate effectively, and streamline your workflow. Try Lovart now!

hero.title: Lovart: Unleash Your Creative Genius with AI-Powered Design
hero.subtitle: Lovart is the revolutionary design platform meticulously crafted for visionary creators like you. We empower you with a suite of intuitive tools, supercharged by cutting-edge AI-driven insights from Lovart, enabling you to effortlessly transform your most ambitious concepts into breathtaking realities. Say goodbye to cumbersome software and hello to a seamless, inspiring design journey with Lovart. Join our Lovart community today and redefine what's possible in digital creation.

features.title: Explore Core Lovart Features for Unprecedented Creativity

items.title: AI-Enhanced Creativity with Lovart
items.desc: Lovart's sophisticated artificial intelligence acts as your personal design assistant. It intelligently suggests compelling design elements, harmonious color palettes, and optimal layout options, effectively supercharging your creative process with Lovart and helping you overcome creative blocks. With Lovart, innovation is always at your fingertips.

items.title: Intuitive Drag & Drop Interface by Lovart
items.desc: This Lovart platform boasts a beautifully designed, seamless, and remarkably user-friendly drag-and-drop interface. This allows you to focus your energy entirely on the art of design, rather than wrestling with complex tools. Lovart makes professional design accessible to everyone.

items.title: Real-Time Collaboration, Powered by Lovart
items.desc: Elevate your teamwork with Lovart's robust collaborative features. Instantly share your Lovart projects, gather precise feedback with on-canvas annotations, and work together seamlessly with clients or team members, no matter where they are located. Lovart fosters creative synergy.

items.title: Vast Integrated Asset Library in Lovart
items.desc: Dive into Lovart's extensive, curated library, offering millions of high-quality stock images, versatile icons, stylish illustrations, and professional fonts directly within the Lovart platform. Find the perfect asset to complement your vision without ever leaving Lovart.

items.title: Lovart's Versatile One-Click Export Options
items.desc: Your masterpiece is ready, and Lovart ensures it reaches its audience flawlessly. Export your designs in a multitude of formats suitable for web, print, social media, and more, all with Lovart's streamlined, intelligent one-click export process. Lovart respects your time.

items.title: Flawless Responsive Design Previews by Lovart
items.desc: In today's multi-device world, Lovart ensures your creations look impeccable everywhere. Instantly preview how your Lovart designs adapt to various screen sizes, from desktops to tablets and smartphones, using Lovart's built-in, accurate preview tools.

how_it_works.title: From Idea to Impact: How Lovart Streamlines Your Design Workflow

steps.title: Ignite Your Project: Sign Up & Choose Your Lovart Canvas
steps.desc: Embark on your creative journey by quickly signing up for Lovart. Get a head start with Lovart’s diverse range of professionally designed templates tailored for various needs, or unleash your unique vision on a completely blank canvas. Lovart adapts to your style.

steps.title: Design with Lovart's AI & Intuitive Tools
steps.desc: Leverage Lovart's powerful AI suggestions and user-friendly drag-and-drop interface. Access a vast library of assets within Lovart to bring your ideas to life quickly and efficiently. Lovart makes complex design simple and fun.

steps.title: Collaborate, Refine & Export with Lovart
steps.desc: Share your Lovart designs for feedback, iterate with ease, and when you're ready, export your masterpiece in various formats using Lovart. From initial concept to final product, Lovart supports your entire creative process.

pricing.title: Find the Perfect Lovart Plan for You
pricing.subtitle: Whether you're just starting out or leading a design team, Lovart offers flexible pricing plans packed with features to elevate your creative output. Choose Lovart and start designing today!

starter.name: Starter Lovart
starter.desc: Perfect for individuals and hobbyists exploring Lovart.
features: Basic AI Design Tools by Lovart

pro.name: Pro Lovart
pro.desc: Ideal for professional designers and freelancers using Lovart.
features: Advanced AI Design Suite by Lovart

team.name: Lovart for Teams
team.desc: For agencies and design teams needing advanced Lovart collaboration.

items.q: What is Lovart and who is it for?
items.a: Lovart is an innovative, AI-powered design platform built for creative professionals, including graphic designers, UI/UX designers, marketers, and content creators. Lovart aims to streamline the design process, enhance creativity with AI assistance, and facilitate seamless collaboration. Whether you're a freelancer or part of a large team, Lovart provides the tools you need to produce stunning visuals efficiently.

items.q: How does the AI in Lovart help my design process?
items.a: Lovart's AI acts as your intelligent design partner. It can suggest color palettes, layout options, font pairings, and even generate design elements based on your input. This helps overcome creative blocks, speeds up ideation, and ensures your designs are aesthetically pleasing and effective. Lovart's AI is designed to augment your skills, not replace them.

items.q: Can I collaborate with my team or clients using Lovart?
items.a: Absolutely! Lovart offers robust real-time collaboration features. You can share your Lovart projects with team members or clients, allow them to comment directly on the canvas, and work together seamlessly. This makes the feedback process smoother and keeps everyone aligned, regardless of their location. Lovart is built for teamwork.

items.q: What kind of assets are available in the Lovart library?
items.a: Lovart provides an extensive integrated library featuring millions of high-quality stock photos, icons, illustrations, and fonts. This allows you to find the perfect assets for your Lovart projects without needing to switch between different platforms or pay for individual assets. The Lovart library is constantly updated to provide fresh and relevant content.

items.q: Is Lovart suitable for responsive web design?
items.a: Yes, Lovart is designed with responsiveness in mind. You can easily preview how your Lovart designs will look on different screen sizes (desktop, tablet, mobile) directly within the platform. Lovart's tools help you create fluid layouts and ensure your visuals are optimized for every device, providing a seamless user experience for your audience.

footer.about_desc: Lovart is your AI-powered partner for exceptional design. We empower creators with intuitive tools and intelligent features to bring visions to life. Discover the future of design with Lovart.

overview.title: Why Teams Choose Lovart Features
overview.desc: Lovart combines AI creativity, production speed, and publishing-ready output in one visual workspace. This helps teams move from idea to launch without switching tools.

cards.title: Faster Ideation and Drafting
cards.desc: Generate layout, copy direction, and visual style options in minutes instead of starting from a blank canvas.

cards.title: Consistent Brand Quality
cards.desc: Use shared styles, reusable assets, and guided suggestions to keep every campaign aligned with your brand system.

cards.title: Multi-Channel Delivery
cards.desc: Prepare web, social, and print-ready assets from one source file so your team can publish faster with fewer revisions.

workflow.title: How Lovart Features Fit Your Workflow
workflow.desc: A practical 4-step process for design, review, and delivery with fewer handoffs.

steps.label: Step 1
steps.title: Define goals and creative direction
steps.desc: Start with campaign objective, audience, and brand constraints so AI suggestions remain relevant.

steps.label: Step 2
steps.title: Generate and refine visual options
steps.desc: Use AI suggestions plus drag-and-drop editing to quickly compare multiple compositions.

steps.label: Step 3
steps.title: Review, comment, and align
steps.desc: Collect feedback and finalize assets with clear iteration history before publishing.

steps.label: Step 4
steps.title: Export and distribute assets
steps.desc: Export in the right format and deliver to web, social, and presentation channels.

items.q: What can I build with Lovart features?
items.a: You can create social creatives, ad banners, landing visuals, brand assets, and presentation graphics from one workspace.

items.q: Is Lovart suitable for non-designers?
items.a: Yes. The AI suggestions and drag-and-drop editor reduce design complexity, so marketers and founders can produce quality visuals quickly.

items.q: Can I keep brand consistency across campaigns?
items.a: Yes. Shared assets, structured layouts, and guided styling help teams maintain consistent visual output over time.

items.q: Are generated designs available for commercial usage?
items.a: Commercial usage support is included in current plans. Check the pricing page for the latest details and plan differences.

items.q: Which plan should I choose for advanced features?
items.a: If you need higher output volume and faster throughput, compare Basic, Pro, and Ultimate on the pricing page before subscribing.

seo.title: Lovart AI Pricing Plans | Affordable Design Solutions
seo.description: Find the perfect Lovart AI pricing plan for your needs. Explore our flexible and affordable options for individuals, teams, and businesses.
seo.keywords: lovart ai pricing, lovart pricing, lovart plans, ai design platform cost

hero.title: Lovart AI Pricing Plans
hero.desc: Choose from four Lovart plans built for creators, teams, and businesses. Compare monthly and yearly billing, fast-point quotas, and AI production limits in one place.

plans.name: Starter
plans.desc: A practical entry plan for solo creators shipping client-ready visual content every week.

plans.name: Basic
plans.desc: The balanced plan for creators who need stronger throughput and unlimited slow generation for daily production.
features: Commercial license and collaboration handoff ready

plans.name: Pro
plans.desc: Built for high-volume teams that require speed, multi-tasking capacity, and higher output quality.
features: Flash sale pricing with strong yearly savings

plans.name: Ultimate
plans.desc: Enterprise-level capacity for agencies and advanced teams managing multiple campaigns at once.
features: Unlimited Slow Generations with top model access

why_choose.title: Why Lovart Pricing Converts Better
why_choose.p1: Each Lovart pricing tier maps to a real production stage, from solo drafts to enterprise-scale delivery. You can upgrade or downgrade without changing your core workflow, so your billing grows only when your output demand grows.
why_choose.p2: Fast Points cover speed-critical jobs, while Unlimited Slow Generations protect your baseline throughput. This dual-track model keeps your creative pipeline stable, predictable, and cost-efficient.

comparison_table.title: Detailed Plan Comparison
comparison_table.summary: Use this matrix to compare image generation limits, commercial license scope, and developer-focused capabilities.

deep_dive.title: How to Choose the Right Lovart AI Plan
deep_dive.p1: If your team ships occasional creative assets, Starter or Basic usually covers the full workflow with predictable monthly cost. Both plans include commercial-ready output, so freelance and in-house teams can publish safely.
deep_dive.p2: Pro is ideal when your pipeline depends on faster turns, multi-task rendering, and premium model access. It is designed for teams that manage multiple campaigns and need reliable throughput during deadline spikes.
deep_dive.p3: Ultimate is optimized for agencies and advanced operators who need maximum Fast Points, large concurrent capacity, and top-tier support. This plan keeps enterprise-scale production stable while controlling unit cost.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Lovart Pricing

items.q: Can I start with a smaller plan and upgrade later?
items.a: Yes. You can move from Starter to Basic, Pro, or Ultimate whenever your workload grows. Plan changes apply to the next billing cycle unless a prorated upgrade is offered.

items.q: What is the difference between Fast Points and Slow Generations?
items.a: Fast Points are used for speed-critical generations with shorter queue times. Slow Generations run with longer queues but preserve throughput, and several plans include them without a hard cap.

items.q: Do all plans include commercial usage rights?
items.a: Yes. Every listed plan includes commercial usage rights for generated assets, with broader operational coverage in Pro and Ultimate.

items.q: Is there a discount for yearly billing?
items.a: Yes. All four plans provide lower effective monthly pricing when billed yearly. This is the recommended option for long-term production teams.

items.q: How should teams choose between Pro and Ultimate?
items.a: Choose Pro for high-volume marketing and product design teams. Choose Ultimate when you require higher concurrency, larger monthly quotas, and enterprise-level support windows.

contact.title: Need a Custom Pricing Setup?
contact.desc: If your team requires dedicated onboarding, higher quotas, or custom procurement terms, contact us for a tailored Lovart AI package.

hero.title: About Lovart

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.desc: Our mission is to empower the creative process by integrating generative AI with intuitive design tools. We aim to automate professional-grade workflows, making sophisticated branding accessible to everyone.

values.title: Boosting Efficiency

timeline.desc: Lovart AI founded in San Francisco; core research on MCoT (Mind Chain of Thought) reasoning engine begins.
Global beta phase attracts over 800,000 creators, proving the value of human-AI collaboration in design.
Official launch of the Design Agent platform, revolutionizing creative workflows across 70 countries.
Scaling multi-agent orchestration to handle complex, cross-media design challenges for global brands.

steps.title: Commercial Export
steps.desc: Download your creations with commercial licenses. High-resolution exports supported.

items.question: How are credits calculated?
items.answer:
Lovart has two main credit paths:

  • Agent Credits: Used when AI interprets complex instructions and workflows.
  • Canvas Credits: Used when generating images on canvas, based on size, quality, and model.

Higher quality settings and advanced models consume more credits.

items.question: Do credits expire?
items.answer:
Yes, depending on credit type:

  • Subscription Credits: Reset at the end of each billing cycle and do not roll over.
  • Top-up Credits: Permanent and never expire.

items.question: Can generated content be used commercially?
items.answer: Yes. Users own the commercial usage rights for generated content, but usage must follow the underlying model license (for example Flux or Midjourney terms). You cannot resell the model itself or build a competing model service with the outputs.

items.question: What is Unlimited mode and when can I use it?
items.answer: Unlimited mode is available on eligible plans for non-high-speed generation scenarios. It is designed for broader exploration and is protected by fair-use and anti-abuse rules.

items.question: What is the refund policy?
items.answer: Refund requests are supported within 7 days for accounts with very low usage (commonly under 20 consumed credits). Contact official support to start the refund process.

faq_cta.title: Need more credits?
faq_cta.desc: Upgrade your plan to get more credits and commercial usage rights.

seo.title: Terms of Service - Lovart AI Design Platform
seo.description: View Lovart Terms of Service and User Agreement to understand your rights, obligations, service scope, payment policies, and usage restrictions when using Lovart AI Design Platform. Familiarize yourself with our content policies, data processing terms, and account management rules.
seo.keywords: Terms of Service, User Agreement, Lovart Terms, AI Design Platform Agreement

hero.title: Terms of Service
hero.desc: Welcome to Lovart AI Design Platform. Please read the following terms of service carefully, which govern your rights and obligations when using our services.

sections.title: 1. Acceptance of Agreement
content: Welcome to Lovart AI Design Platform (hereinafter referred to as "Lovart"). By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by this User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as "Agreement").

If you do not agree to any part of this Agreement, please do not use our services. We reserve the right to modify, update, or change this Agreement at any time, and recommend that you check the latest version regularly.
Continued use of Lovart services constitutes your acceptance of any revised terms. If you have any questions about this Agreement, please contact our customer service team.

sections.title: 2. Service Description
content: Lovart is an AI-based design platform providing users with the following core services:

• AI-assisted design tools and features
  • Design templates and resource library
  • Real-time collaboration features
  • Design file export and sharing
  • User account management
We are committed to continuously improving and optimizing the service experience, but reserve the right to modify, suspend, or terminate any service features at any time without prior notice.

subsections.title: 3.1 Account Creation
subsections.content: Using Lovart services requires creating a user account. You agree to provide true, accurate, complete, and up-to-date personal information and promise to update your information in a timely manner.

subsections.title: 3.2 Account Security
subsections.content: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account password and are fully responsible for all activities that occur under your account. If you discover any unauthorized use, please notify us immediately.

subsections.title: 3.3 Age Restrictions
subsections.content: To use Lovart services, you must be at least 18 years old, or at least 13 years old with the consent of a parent or legal guardian. We reserve the right to request proof of age.

subsections.title: 4.1 Subscription Fees
subsections.content: Lovart offers different levels of subscription plans, each with corresponding fees and features. All fees are calculated in US dollars and paid through our accepted payment methods.

subsections.title: 4.2 Automatic Renewal
subsections.content: Subscriptions will automatically renew unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing cycle. You can manage your subscription status in your account settings.

subsections.title: 4.3 Refund Policy
subsections.content: We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with the service within 30 days of purchase, you can request a full refund. No refunds will be given after 30 days.

subsections.title: 5.1 Permitted Use
subsections.content:
You agree to use Lovart only for lawful purposes, including but not limited to:
  • Creating personal and commercial design projects
  • Collaborating on designs with team members
  • Learning and improving design skills
  • Creating materials for marketing and promotion

subsections.title: 5.2 Prohibited Use
subsections.content:
You may not use Lovart for the following purposes:
  • Creating illegal, fraudulent, or false content
  • Infringing on others' intellectual property or privacy rights
  • Distributing malware or viruses
  • Sending spam or conducting unauthorized marketing
  • Interfering with other users' experience

subsections.title: 5.3 Content Responsibility
subsections.content: You are fully responsible for all content created and shared through Lovart. We reserve the right to remove content that violates this Agreement and may suspend or terminate relevant accounts.

subsections.title: 6.1 Lovart Intellectual Property
subsections.content: The Lovart platform and all its components, including but not limited to software, designs, text, graphics, logos, and trademarks, are owned by Lovart or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws.

subsections.title: 6.2 User Content Rights
subsections.content: You retain ownership of content created through Lovart. By uploading or creating content, you grant Lovart a limited, worldwide, royalty-free license to provide and improve the service.

subsections.title: 6.3 Third-Party Content
subsections.content: Lovart may contain content, templates, or resources provided by third parties. The use of such content is subject to the corresponding third-party terms or license agreements.

sections.title: 7. Disclaimer
content: Lovart services are provided on an "as is" basis, without any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement.

We do not guarantee that the service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. We make no warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content or information obtained through the service.
You understand and agree that your use of the service is at your own risk. Lovart is not liable for any direct or indirect losses arising from the use of the service.

sections.title: 8. Limitation of Liability
content: To the maximum extent permitted by law, Lovart and its affiliates, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising from the use or inability to use the service.
Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid for the service in the past 12 months. If you have a free account, our maximum liability is $100.
Some jurisdictions do not allow the exclusion or limitation of liability for incidental or consequential damages, so these limitations may not apply to you.

contact.title: Have Questions?
contact.desc: If you have any questions about this User Agreement, please feel free to contact our customer service team.

footer.desc: AI-powered design platform for creative professionals.

seo.title: Privacy Policy - Lovart AI Design Platform
seo.description: Learn about Lovart's Privacy Policy, including how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information, data processing guidelines, third-party sharing principles, your privacy rights, and how to manage your account data privacy settings.
seo.keywords: Privacy Policy, Data Protection, Personal Information, Lovart Privacy, AI Design Platform Privacy

hero.title: Privacy Policy
hero.desc: At Lovart, we value your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.

subsections.title: 1.1 Information You Provide
subsections.content:
When you use Lovart services, we may collect the following information you actively provide:
  • Registration Information: Name, email address, password
  • Payment Information: Credit card information, billing address (processed via secure payment processors)
  • Profile Information: Avatar, bio, professional information
  • Communication Content: Customer support inquiries, feedback

subsections.title: 1.2 Automatically Collected Information
subsections.content:
When you use our services, we automatically collect the following information:
  • Device Information: Device type, operating system, browser information
  • Usage Data: Access times, page views, clickstream data
  • Location Information: Approximate location based on IP address
  • Performance Data: Page load times, error reports

subsections.title: 1.3 Design Files and Project Data
subsections.content: To provide design services, we collect and process design files, project settings, and collaboration data you create on the platform. This data is stored on secure servers and used solely to provide you with design services.

sections.title: 2. Information Usage
content: We use the collected information to:

• Provide Services: Provide you with AI design tools and collaboration features
  • Improve Services: Analyze usage data to improve user experience and features
  • Customer Support: Respond to your inquiries and provide technical support
  • Security Protection: Detect and prevent fraud and abusive activities
  • Marketing Communication: Send relevant marketing information with your consent
  • Legal Compliance: Comply with applicable laws and regulations

subsections.title: AI Model Training
subsections.content: We may use anonymized design data to improve our AI models. We ensure this data is strictly processed to be non-identifiable to specific individuals, and you can opt-out of data collection for AI training.

sections.title: 3. Information Sharing
content: We do not sell your personal information. We only share information in the following circumstances:

subsections.title: 3.1 Service Providers
subsections.content:
We share information with the following types of service providers:
  • Cloud Service Providers: For data storage and processing
  • Payment Processors: For processing payment transactions
  • Email Service Providers: For sending notifications and marketing emails
  • Analytics Service Providers: For analyzing usage data

subsections.title: 3.2 Legal Requirements
subsections.content:
We may disclose your information as required by law in the following circumstances:
  • Responding to legal processes, government requests, or court orders
  • Protecting our rights, property, or safety
  • Investigating and preventing fraud or illegal activities
  • Protecting the personal safety of users

subsections.title: 3.3 Business Transfers
subsections.content: If we are involved in a merger, acquisition, or asset sale, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction. We will notify you in advance of any such change.

sections.title: 4. Data Security
content: We take the following measures to protect your personal information:

• Encryption Technology: Use SSL/TLS for data transmission encryption, sensitive information stored with AES-256 encryption
  • Access Control: Strictly limit employee access to personal information
  • Security Audits: Regularly conduct security audits and vulnerability scans
  • Backup Systems: Regularly backup important data to prevent data loss
  • Employee Training: Train employees on data security and privacy protection

subsections.title: Data Retention
subsections.content: We retain your information based on business needs and legal requirements. When you delete your account or no longer need our services, we will delete or anonymize your personal information in accordance with applicable laws.

sections.title: 5. User Rights
content: Under applicable data protection laws, you have the following rights:

subsections.title: 5.1 Right to Access
subsections.content: You have the right to request a copy of your personal information we hold, including the types of information collected, purposes of use, and sharing recipients.

subsections.title: 5.2 Right to Rectification
subsections.content: If you find that the personal information we hold is inaccurate or incomplete, you have the right to request us to correct or supplement such information.

subsections.title: 5.3 Right to Erasure
subsections.content: In certain circumstances, you have the right to request us to delete your personal information, such as when the information is no longer needed for the collection purposes.

subsections.title: 5.4 Right to Data Portability
subsections.content: You have the right to receive your personal information in a structured, commonly used, and machine-readable format, and have the right to transmit those data to another service provider.

subsections.title: 5.5 Right to Object
subsections.content: You have the right to object to our processing of your personal information based on legitimate interests, and to object to our processing of your personal information for direct marketing purposes.

sections.title: 6. Cookie Policy
content: We use Cookies and similar technologies to improve your user experience:

subsections.title: 6.1 Essential Cookies
subsections.content: These Cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website, including user authentication, security protection, and website features. Without these Cookies, the website cannot function properly.

subsections.title: 6.2 Performance Cookies
subsections.content: These Cookies help us understand how visitors interact with the website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.

subsections.title: 6.3 Functional Cookies
subsections.content: These Cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences.

subsections.title: 6.4 Cookie Management
subsections.content: You can manage Cookie preferences through your browser settings. Please note that disabling certain Cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

sections.title: 7. Children's Privacy
content: Lovart is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

If we become aware that we have collected personal information from a child under 13, we will take reasonable steps to delete such information immediately. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.
For users aged 13 to 18, we recommend using our services under the guidance of a parent or guardian.

sections.title: 8. Policy Changes
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. When the policy changes, we will:

• Post the updated policy on the website
  • Update the "Last Updated" date at the top of the policy
  • Notify of significant changes via email or other means
  • Obtain your consent where required by applicable law
We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to understand how we protect your personal information.

contact.title: Privacy Inquiries
contact.desc: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or need to exercise your data rights, please feel free to contact us.

footer.desc: AI-powered design platform for creative professionals.

what.title: What is the Lovart API?
what.desc: The Lovart API provides programmatic access to one of the most powerful AI design platforms available. Lovart AI combines advanced generative models — including Flux, Stable Diffusion, and proprietary engines — into a single, unified platform. Whether you are building automated design workflows or exploring AI-powered creativity, the Lovart API offers the tools to transform text prompts into stunning images, enhance existing visuals, and generate short videos. The platform is accessible via a web interface and a Discord Bot, making it flexible for both casual users and professional teams.

items.title: AI Image Generation
items.desc: Generate high-quality visuals from text descriptions using the Lovart API's advanced models.

items.title: Image Enhancement
items.desc: Upscale and optimize images with AI-powered enhancement through the platform.

items.title: Video Generation
items.desc: Create short videos from images or text prompts — a standout platform capability.

items.title: Template Library
items.desc: Access a curated library of design templates available on the platform.

items.title: Multi-Model Support
items.desc: The Lovart API supports multiple AI models including Flux and Stable Diffusion.

items.title: Multiple AI Models
items.desc: Access Flux, Stable Diffusion, and more — all through the unified Lovart API.

items.title: Affordable Plans
items.desc: Plans start at $9/month with flexible credit options for every budget.

items.title: Commercial License
items.desc: All paid plans include full commercial usage rights for generated content.

items.title: Active Community
items.desc: Join an active Discord community of creators for inspiration and support.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Lovart API

items.q: What is the Lovart API used for?
items.a: The Lovart API enables programmatic access to AI-powered design features including image generation, image editing, video creation, and template-based workflows. It is designed for developers and businesses looking to integrate AI design capabilities.

items.q: How much does the Lovart API cost?
items.a: It is available through several subscription plans. Pricing starts at $9/month for the Starter plan, which includes 1,200 fast credits. Higher tiers — Basic ($29), Pro ($49), and Ultimate ($99) — offer more credits and priority processing.

items.q: Does the Lovart API offer a free plan?
items.a: Yes, Lovart provides a free tier that allows users to explore the platform's core AI design capabilities with a limited number of credits. You can upgrade to a paid plan at any time for additional access.

items.q: What AI models does the Lovart API support?
items.a: The Lovart API supports multiple state-of-the-art AI models including Flux, Stable Diffusion, and proprietary models, giving users access to a wide range of visual styles and quality levels.

items.q: Can I use Lovart API generated images for commercial purposes?
items.a: Yes, all paid plans include commercial usage rights. You can use generated images and videos for business projects, marketing materials, and client deliverables.

items.q: How do I access the Lovart API?
items.a: The Lovart API is accessible through the web platform at lovart.ai and via the official Discord Bot. Visit the platform to create an account and explore the available features.

how_to.title: Three Simple Steps to Master Lovart AI for Free

step1.title: Register Your Lovart Account
step1.desc: Join the growing Lovart community by signing up with your email or social media account. No credit card is required to start your creative journey. Once registered, the full Lovart platform suite is at your fingertips, ready to transform your ideas into stunning visuals.

step2.title: Activate Your Lovart Free Trial
step2.desc: The moment you log into the Lovart dashboard, your 14-day premium trial is automatically activated. This grants you instant, unrestricted access to all high-end Lovart AI design tools, premium templates, and advanced export options, ensuring you experience the true power of Lovart from day one.

step3.title: Generate Your First Lovart Masterpiece
step3.desc: Dive into the Lovart workspace and use our intelligent AI generator to craft professional logos, social media marketing materials, or complex digital illustrations. With Lovart's intuitive interface, anyone can produce professional-grade designs in seconds, regardless of their prior design experience.

use_cases.title: What Can You Accomplish with Lovart AI for Free?

items.title: Lean Startup Branding
items.desc: Bootstrap your business by using Lovart to draft professional logo concepts and brand identities. The Lovart platform allows you to iterate quickly on your visual strategy without an initial design budget.

items.title: Dynamic Social Media Content
items.desc: Generate high-engagement Lovart designs for Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter. Our AI understands trending layout styles, helping you create posts that stand out in crowded social feeds.

items.title: Creative Personal Expression
items.desc: Experiment with deep learning AI art styles in Lovart to create personalized digital wallpapers, greeting cards, or unique avatars for your personal online presence.

items.title: Impactful Professional Presentations
items.desc: Enhance your slide decks and reports with Lovart's intelligent layout and image suggestions. Lovart helps you create visual assets that communicate your ideas more effectively to clients and colleagues.

items.q: Is the Lovart design tool really free to use?
items.a: Yes, Lovart offers a forever-free version with essential AI design features. Additionally, new users receive a 14-day free trial of the full Lovart Pro features, allowing you to explore the maximum creative potential of our platform without any upfront cost.

items.q: Does the Lovart platform apply watermarks to free designs?
items.a: During your Lovart free trial, exports are generally clean and available in high-resolution, making them perfect for professional use. The standard Lovart free plan provides standard-quality exports that are ideal for social sharing and personal projects.

items.q: Can I use Lovart designs for commercial purposes?
items.a: Absolutely. Any artwork created during your Lovart free trial or with your Lovart account is yours to use. We encourage our community to use Lovart for both personal and small-scale commercial project needs.

items.q: What happens to my projects when the Lovart trial ends?
items.a: All your creative projects are safely stored on the Lovart platform. After the trial, you can choose a Lovart subscription that fits your needs, or stay on the free version. Your existing Lovart work will remain accessible in your account.

items.q: Is my data privacy protected on the Lovart platform?
items.a: Privacy is a core value at Lovart. We use enterprise-grade security protocols to protect all data on the Lovart platform. Your prompts and generated designs are stored securely, ensuring your creative secrets remain yours.

items.q: How can I earn more extra credits within Lovart?
items.a: Beyond our standard plans, the Lovart community rewards active users. You can earn bonus credits by referring friends to Lovart or contributing to our community feedback sessions, helping us make Lovart the best AI design platform.
